transcript: Please introduce yourself and tell about your hobbies. So my hobbies are taking care of my wife, enjoying having a good time with her, or the friends to him. So now I'm a little lower, stay one, stay one and 3 days. So can you help me take care frightened children? Well, be careful with your ego forever. Thanks for watching and I'll see you next time...

evaluation.feedback: The speaker has room for improvement. There is some understanding of sentence structure, but there are many errors and confusing phrases. The speaker's vocabulary is limited and basic. The pronunciation was understandable, but there is still room for improvement. The speaker's responses were not always coherent and there was difficulty in bringing points across. Constant practice and taking English lessons would be beneficial.
